title: Simhomsen Buffalo Checkered Plaid Gingham Lined Table Runner for Halloween, Thanksgiving and Christmas Holiday Parties, Orange and Red Double-Sided Reversible Use (13 × 90 Inch)
features: Orange color side can be used during fall season, Halloween and Thanksgiving Holidays; after thanksgiving, red color side can be used directly for Christmas
Double thickness cotton blended fabric helps to protect the furniture better
It’s of nice weight and will not slide down from table
Matching tablecloth, table runners, place-mats and pillow covers are all available; custom order accepted
Machine washable; slightly steam iron; no shrink, no wrinkle, no color run after washing
description: These table runner and place-mats are sold separately. They can be used for both thanksgiving and Christmas. Its double thickness will help to protect the furniture. If you want a customized size of table runner, tablecloth or place-mats, please do not hesitate to contact us! Wish you a happy thanksgiving and Merry Christmas as well!
